tasks.description: A test with Bowsers different from FON ones (DB251 and DB252) was requested and still pending

tasks.title: DB248 without FMS
tasks.description: RGM didn't have the Bowser prepared for the Scheduled GAFS support. Next support availability is 16/07/2025 13 Hrs. SAST (08 Hrs SRT)

tasks.title: Fake Bypass alarm fixing
tasks.description: A new automation for Pump Controller by GVR Team was recently sent. The Truck Prime UX installed in DB251 and DB252 is showing Bypass alarm every time a refuel starts. Once one pump is off, the system is recognizing this pump as a Bypass. In order to have a real alarm notification, this fixing was requested to GVR.
